I selected this Dokotoo Womens Casual Boho Floral Print Short Sleeve Top for my Spring wardrobe and have really enjoyed wearing it. The style is unique - I especially love the sleeves. The gold color is quite flattering and the style accents give it that fun "boho" style. The sleeves a bit tight, so if you have larger upper arms check the sizing chart. It launders well and looks great dressed up or down. Enjoy!

Great shirt for Spring and into summer.  Easy to transition with a cardigan until the warm weather is closer!  The floral print is muted and blends nicely with all shades of black and brown.  The material is thin, but not fully sheer and hands very nicely.  Highly Recommend!

Sorry that I couldn't get a better picture, but I wanted to get a good representation of the colors.  They are beautiful and so feminine.  I've paired this with jeans and booties as well as slacks.  The blouse doesn't show wrinkles, so it's perfect and a quick go-to.  For reference, I am a normal size 4-6, 5'6, 140 lbs and ordered a M, my normal size.  It fit perfectly.  I would absolutely order this again.

I love the pattern on this pullover top. As other reviews have stated, even though it’s listed as green, the background color is gray, which I think looks better anyway. The sleeves are pretty, & so are the pink buttons. The top fits very well throughout & is not too long (it’s about hip length). It looks great with dress pants or jeans. I’m not usually a fan of 100% polyester fabric, but I made an exception because this too is so pretty.
If this had some stretch, I would have given it 5 stars. Lined, so it’s not see-through. Cute sleeve details and pattern. Easy to dress up or down. I’ll probably buy another one!
This blouse is nice. It’s very well made and is made of quality fabric. My problem is with the trim, it makes the whole blouse look cheap. Not for me I guess.
Great fit good and long

I have ordered several products from Dokotoo and the majority of the time they are high quality and I really like them. I chose the yellow color in this top and it is so pretty and will be perfect for spring. The yellow flower print is very flattering and the white detail is a nice design touch. The fabric is soft and flowy without being sheer or see through. I ordered my normal size large and it fit perfectly.
I bought 4 tops of this style  and I like all of it, true to size, nice color and pattern. Overall I am satisfied
Really nice blouse!!!  Made really well. Fits perfectly.  Not see through.  Great cut.  Light material. My wife loves it. Great value.
The shirt is silky soft and comfortable. The details on the sleeves are flattering. It doesn’t have much stretch to it. I ordered my regular size and it fits good. The quality of the shirt is great.

I picked up this Dokotoo floral blouse in a medium in the pink. I am happy with the look, fit, and fabrication of this blouse. The short sleeves are trimmed in a white bric-a-brac and there are several matching buttons at the neckline. I like that the sleeves are flattering and not puffy or too short. They hide the flabby parts of my arm and the tulip cut has a slimming effect. The blouse bodice is fully lined, and it drapes nicely, even over my wide hips. I paired this with a simple pair of slacks and with the button neckline, you really do not need any additional accessories. I wore this to work and received so many compliments! It was a nice pop of color in my bland winter wardrobe! I layered this under a blazer but would be confident wearing it on its own come warmer weather. Made in China, this 100% polyester blouse is an easy wear, easy care look that will have you pulled together and out the door for work in the blink of an eye! This blouse is machine washable. To protect the fabric and sleeve trim, I washed this inside a mesh garment bag in cold water. I then hung it to dry. Once dry, it did not need any ironing. Out of the package, it had creases from being folded and vacuum packed. I tossed it in the dryer on the refresh cycle for 10 minutes, pulled it out while still warm and all the wrinkles fell away! This top can be dressed up or down, wear with jeans and sandals or slacks and ballet flats! I love that it isn’t low cut or puffy in the sleeves. Overall, it fits me perfectly and for size reference, I am 5’4” and weigh 150lbs. I am pear shaped with a 36b bust.

Beautiful floral blouse! Runs true to size chart, I ordered a size medium. For reference I’m 5’7 approximately 155lbs and wear a 34E on top. Material is incredibly lightweight, feminine and very flattering! I especially love the details on the sleeve! Definitely 5 stars, highly recommend!

评论概述: Feminine top in gorgeous happy color
评论详情: This top is very pretty! The inner and outer materials are thin and airy without being cheap or see-through. I love color and the accents around the arms. The hang is perfectly forgiving and flowy. It is perfect for spring or summer or anytime here in Florida. I love this top and am happy to have it!!
Very nice blouse.  Its 2 layers so to aid in the sheerness of the outer material.  Fun way to dress up Jean's. Fits true to size.  Good quality and value.  Great choice for a cute blouse!

I have worn this top twice now. It is a great top. The sleeves are a great length and the overlapping and pom poms are darling details. The pattern isn’t grandmaish at all. It is very faltering and works for a lot of different skin tones. The buttons down the front lets you wear an undershirt to open up the neckline. The length of the shirt is good and can be tucked in. I wouldn’t wear it with leggings. The best part of this shirt is that it is lined with a coordinating color. This shirt is a great pattern and has a lot of details that make it stand out.
SIZE XXL. fit perfect. We would purchase again.
I have gotten soooo many compliments today!! I ordered an XL and it fits like an XL should. Love the neck, love the sleeves, love the pattern and colors! Looks great with dress pants or jeans!

Wife loves this button front top. It looks great and feels super soft. The sizing was spot on for her size that she normally orders. Feels great, well made and a super price for a super cute stylish top. Goes with almost any pants or shorts. Coordinates well with blue jeans also.

I got the size Medium, my typical size, and the shirt was a smidge tight across the bust (36C) though wearable.  The shoulders and the rest of the shirt fit well, so unless you're busty you can order your regular size.  The pattern that I got, Blue with red and white, is very nice looking and will go with a bunch of things from white to blue denim.  I like that the blouse is lined so that there is no see-through.  And, surprisingly, the blouse came nicely packaged so that it had no wrinkles when I took it out of its bag!

This shirt is perfect for wearing to the office or any sort of "business casual" setting.  It's professional-looking while being attractive and comfortable, too.  The colors, pattern, and sleeves all make this stand out over most run-of-the-mill dressy shirts.  I really like this and I'm glad I got it.

This shirt is super cute and light weight. The details on the sleeves kicks the shirt up a notch and gives it an upscale look. It fits as expected, and has buttons on the front going down to around the base of your sternum, so you can "choose your own adventure" level of cleavage for the day; it's nice to have the choice and allows you to wear it to work, or to a cocktail hour... you pick.

This floral blouse is a beautiful print! I like the weight of it, since it is lightweight without being see through. The cut/style is flattering. The print is one that can be worn year round, with shorts or jeans/slacks.
Nice top. I bought the navy. The red flowers are more orangey in person. I am 5'3" 155lbs and the medium fit loose and flowy which was the look I was going for.
The material is soft and the print is beautiful.  This is not a stretchy fabric so be aware if you have hips the fit will vary around your hips.

This is a gorgeous blouse.  It is lined and a nice weight.  The petal style sleeves accommodate all sizes of upper arms easily.  The crochet trim is really nicely done and elevates the style.  I do think the true red in the photo online is not quite accurate to what I received, which pulls a smidge more orange than a brick red.  I think the bodice runs a smidge small, so consider sizing up if you are fuller around the middle.
runs big.  Very loose fitting.  colors are very mild. Materal is see through  so it will require layering. very dressy and professional.

The blouse was selected for a woman 5'8", 165 lbs.; the size Large is a perfect fit. The chiffon fabric is light and breezy, nicely textured, and comfortable. The shirt is fully lined, except the sleeves, with a satiny smooth fabric that is luxuriously soft against the skin. The petal sleeves with the decorative edging add a touch of elegance. This flexible blouse can be dressed up or down, and look flattering in either case. I highly recommend it,.

I really love the pattern on this shirt! I think it’s so pretty! Even though it’s advertised as a spring and summer shirt, it will also look great with a cardigan over it for cooler months. It has an under layer to prevent it from being see through. In the summer that adds an extra layer that may not be preferred. I will definitely be wearing this with slacks in my business casual work environment
